description: A CLI tool that simplifies mobile app creation for Titanium developers by generating clean, optimized CSS files using Tailwind CSS methodology for Alloy projects.
rules: Always run PurgeTSS commands from the root directory of a Titanium Alloy project
Use 'purgetss init' to create the initial configuration file before using other commands
The config.cjs file should be placed in './purgetss/' directory for project-specific configurations
Use 'purgetss --all' to run build, build-fonts, and purge commands in the correct sequence
Custom classes and theme extensions should be defined in the config.cjs file under purge.options
Font files should be placed in './purgetss/fonts/' directory before running 'purgetss build-fonts'
Always backup your original app.tss file before running purge operations
